text: -  Combination chemotherapy.    - Combination chemotherapy with radiation therapy to parts of the body with cancer.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage I adult Hodgkin lymphoma and stage II adult Hodgkin lymphoma. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such as the location of the trial, the type of treatment, or the name of the drug.
